name: Limo Limbo
description:
It's late, and you've just gotten into your ride home. Yet something's off, the driver isn't communicating, and the car is even less cooperative. It's up to you to figure out what's going on, and try something different in the hope that maybe this time, things will change.

But how much control do you really have?

(Note: There is a small bug found once you gain a certain item, we are aware of it and will be fixing it as soon as the Jam is over! Please just wait for the timer to move forward, the game will continue automatically. Apologies!)

Story by Morg.

Coding by Mo. 

Cover art by D.O.D.

Made in Twine for the 2020 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam. Ver. 1.19
